Since Ms. Kahf is from Syria, it can be inferred that her parents are also likely to be of Syrian nationality.

| Person          | Nationality | Whether the Person has the Nationality |
|----------------|-------------|--------------------------------------|
| Ms. Kahf       | Syrian     | Yes                                  |
| Ms. Kahf's parents | Syrian   | Presumed (not explicitly stated)      |

Note that the second row is marked as "Presumed" because the nationality of Ms. Kahf's parents is not explicitly stated in the paragraph.
